item.title: Getting More from Komodo IDE Docker and Vagrant Integration
item.description: We recently released Komodo 9.2, which boasts integration with Docker and Vagrant, as well as a boatload of other features and enhancements. Unfortunately, syntax highlighting for Dockerfile and Vagrantfile did not quite make the cut due to timing [...]

item.title: Komodo 9.2 Pre-Release Ready for Testing
item.description: It's Komodo 9.2 pre-release time! We're coming to you with a ton of goodies this release, but we need you to help us test things out! Please read on to learn more about the changes [...]

item.title: The Komodo in Cascadia(JS)

item.description: Ever heard of EditorConfig? We sure have. Numerous requests have come in for us to add support, on our bug tracker, our forums and even in person (we still have the stickers) [...]

item.title: Quickly Run Shell Commands with Komodo IDE
item.description: With Komodo 9.1 we've added a new shell scope, which facilitates our new package managers integration. But you can also use it simply to run shell commands. Of course you could already do this using the `Tools > Run Command` dialog [...]

item.title: Komodo 9.1 Pre-Release Now Available
item.description: We're very happy to announce the pre-release of Komodo 9.1. This release primarily focuses on Commando, and its all-new package management functionality [...]

item.title: Go For Pythonistas
item.description: As you may know, we've recently added Golang support in Komodo IDE 9. You asked for it, you got it! Go is a statically-typed language with syntax loosely derived from C, with added garbage collection, type safety [...]
